word:
I hope you are doing well. I would be so glad to see you. May the Lord bless you and lead you to put your trust in Him entirely. He loves you and will delight to bless you if you will come to Him for light and 


                                     -306- 

strength. Do, my sister, identify yourself with the people of God. Stand in the ranks and under the banner of Jesus Christ. Much love to my dear sister, Lizzie, from her twin sister, Ellen G. White.--Letter 6b, 1880. 





Ellen G. White Estate 
Silver Spring, Maryland 
January 11, 1990. Entire Letter.
